root.name: Mirage
root.description: BackgroundFrom the Swiss developer Mario Von Rickenbach comes this abstract game where you float around as a top hat below water, in a most surreal world. The game has been nominated for "Excellence in Visual Art" at IGF 2012."Mirage" is the diploma project of Mario Von Rickenbach.GameplayThe main ability of the top hat is to be able to attach yourself to several different human features.Whatever you attach yourself to seem to confer special abilities. From the released trailer you can at least see that by attaching yourself to the mouth (one or more) you are able to consume different stuff in the environment. According to description on webpage, by attaching yourself to different human body parts, you can perceive the environment differently.ReleaseThe release date is so far: "it's done when it's done." -http://www.mariov.ch/mirage/
